LanguageData.NY_ForgingDragonPlayer.label: loong's new nest
LanguageData.NY_ForgingDragonPlayer.description: Loongs left their previous societies for a new life.
LanguageData.NY_ForgingDragonUnion.label: Loyal union of loong
LanguageData.NY_ForgingDragonUnion.description: A loose organization united by the shared goal of searching for the "emperor's command".They're unfriendly to outsiders, their organization is disarranged, their technology is outdated, but these shortcomings are overcame by their cultural heritages, the superior individual strength of loongs, and the productivity derived from it.
